	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Rob
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code_type_id as integer,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Tcross
source(output(
		ingprov as decimal(28,10),
		inginaid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Ing
Ipa select(mapColumn(
		ipaipaid,
		ipainaid,
		ipaicaid,
		iparistor,
		ipapcod2,
		ipaendate,
		ipapcode,
		ipapdays,
		ipastdate,
		ipapcdtxt,
		ipamarketripercentage,
		ipaabatementpercentage,
		ipapoolpercentage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Ipatable
Rob select(mapColumn(
		rob_count_risk_days,
		pk_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> PreDimRiskObject
Tcross filter(source_system =='PARIS' && code_type_id == 802) ~> PrlType802
PreDimRiskObject derive(rob_count_risk_days = case coalesce(rob_count_risk_days, 0) <= 21, 0, 1)) ~> RobRateInd
Ing select(mapColumn(
		ingingid,
		ingpremshare,
		ingetcbroker,
		ingprov,
		inginaid,
		ingln2,
		ingagent,
		ingsettlynsw
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Ingtable
Ingtable filter(ingprov > 0) ~> IngCols
IngCols aggregate(groupBy(inginaid),
	ingprov = max(ingprov)) ~> BkrProcPerIna
BkrProcPerIna derive(ingprov = isNull(ingprov,0)) ~> IngRRBrokerPercent
Tcross filter(source_system=='PARIS' && code_type_id == 391) ~> Reason391
Reason391 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_reason = source_code_key,
		target_code_reason = target_code,
		target_description_reason = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefReason
PrlType802 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key_premtype = source_code_key,
		target_code_premtype = target_code,
		target_description_premtype = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> XrefPremType
Ipatable, RobRateInd join(concat('P',ipaicaid) == pk_key,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> IpaRob
IpaRob, IngRRBrokerPercent join(ipainaid == inginaid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> IpaIna
IpaIna, XrefReason join(ipapcod2 == source_code_key_reason,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> IpaXrefReason
IpaXrefReason, XrefPremType join(ipapcode == source_code_key_premtype,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> IpaXrefPremType
IpaXrefPremType derive(target_code_reason = coalesce(target_code_reason, 'N/A'),
		target_description_reason = coalesce(target_description_reason, 'Not Applicable'),
		target_code_premtype = coalesce(target_code_premtype, 'N/A'),
		target_description_premtype = coalesce(target_description_premtype, 'Not Applicable')) ~> NoMatchCols
NoMatchCols derive(last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_premium_line_pa',
		prl_ri_vessel_type = 'N/A') ~> Constants
Constants select(mapColumn(
		pk_key = ipaipaid,
		ipainaid,
		ipaicaid,
		prl_premium_basis = iparistor,
		ipapcod2,
		{prl_period_to } = ipaendate,
		paris_ipapcode = ipapcode,
		prl_premium_days = ipapdays,
		{prl_period_from } = ipastdate,
		prl_text = ipapcdtxt,
		ipamarketripercentage,
		ipaabatementpercentage,
		ipapoolpercentage,
		prl_pro_rata_ind = rob_count_risk_days,
		pk_key_rob = pk_key,
		inginaid,
		ingprov,
		source_code_key_reason,
		target_code_reason,
		prl_reason = target_description_reason,
		source_code_key_premtype,
		prl_type_code = target_code_premtype,
		{prl_type_code_desc } = target_description_premtype,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(mapColumn(
		ipaipaid = pk_key,
		ipainaid,
		ipaicaid,
		iparistor = prl_premium_basis,
		ipapcod2,
		ipaendate = {prl_period_to },
		ipapcode = paris_ipapcode,
		ipapdays = prl_premium_days,
		ipastdate = {prl_period_from },
		ipapcdtxt = prl_text,
		ipamarketripercentage,
		ipaabatementpercentage,
		ipapoolpercentage,
		rob_count_risk_days = prl_pro_rata_ind,
		pk_key,
		inginaid,
		ingprov,
		source_code_key_reason,
		target_code_reason,
		target_description_reason = prl_reason,
		source_code_key_premtype,
		target_code_premtype = prl_type_code,
		target_description_premtype = {prl_type_code_desc },
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimPremiumLine
